channeldata.description: This package installs clang compiler, lld linker, tools like llvm-ranlib, llvm-ar, bash, autoconf to compiler autotools on windows. Resulting packages will be MSVC compatible. To use this package, in meta.yaml    build:   requirements:     build:       - vs2017_win-64       - autotools_clang_conda       - llvm-openmp  In bld.bat    call %BUILD_PREFIX%\Library\bin\run_autotools_clang_conda_build.bat   if %ERRORLEVEL% neq 0 exit 1  In build.sh    ./configure --prefix=$PREFIX   [[ "$target_platform" == "win-64" ]] && patch_libtool   make -j${CPU_COUNT}   make install  In case the build script has a different name (for example in multi-output recipes), you can pass the name of the build script in the recipe folder to the bat-script:  In build_subpackage.bat    call %BUILD_PREFIX%\Library\bin\run_autotools_clang_conda_build.bat build_subpackage.sh   if %ERRORLEVEL% neq 0 exit 1
channeldata.summary: Scripts to compile autotools projects on windows using clang and llvm tools
